subject: Golf
Kraft Nabisco Championship (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Jodi Ewart Shadoff, winless on the L.P.G.A. tour, has climbed to the top of the Kraft Nabisco Championship leader board, a feat that did not surprise one sports anchor.
snippet: Jodi Ewart Shadoff, winless on the L.P.G.A. tour, has climbed to the top of the Kraft Nabisco Championship leader board, a feat that did not surprise one sports anchor.
